name: Hentai Cyberpunk
description:
Hentai Cyberpunk is a Third Person Shooter Game, Wave Based.
Fight to survive the waves of enemies falling on you with their own abilities, also formidable Bosses.
Fight against robotic enemies !
Different AIs to challenge you, all differents; unique !
5 camera angles to have fun (Always there ;) )
Futuristic Firearms (Assault Rifle, Shotgun, Sniper, Rocket Launcher)
Glute and Breast Physic !
Amazing Maps in a far distant future !
Futuristic Sci-Fi theme
